application.name: Gnome Connection Manager
application.summary: A tabbed SSH connection manager for GTK+ environments

description.p: Gnome Connection Manager can store passwords for easy access to hosts and supports multiple ssh tunnels for each host.
It has unlimited vertical/horizontal window splitting (you can have as many visible consoles as you want).
Drag and Drop tabs between consoles, connect to multiple hosts with just one click.
Cluster mode allows you to work on several hosts at the same time.
